channel.title: Rohit Daryanani
channel.description: Absolutely awkward proudest of nerd, geek and decreaser of world sucking.

item.title: Raspberry Pi
item.description: So my Raspberry Pi just arrived a few days ago, I got the B+ model which has mo USB ports and 512MB ram. One of the reasons I bought a raspberry pie is I’m trying to familiarize and get comfortable using a POSIX environment since I really suck at it.

item.title: Journey
item.description: So this would be my first official post, I’m starting this blog in order to document the stuff I do. They say you learn better if you can explain or teach it somebody. So here I would be posting all the software development stuff I do as I try to learn and master this craft. As my friend said to me as a software engineer we should be able to document our work.
